title: Ipod Games API
description:
Just a few of my favourite games for the ipod touch and iphone.
Includes:

bowman-just like the flash game
fast and furious-lets race
geodefense-tower defense type game
ishoot-tanks
kitty kannon-just like the flash game
metal gear solid-shoot em up
payback-grand theft auto
tap tap coldplay-just like tap tap(similar idea to guitar hero)
uniwar-no idea but it looked ok so i added it
virtual villagers-real time survival type game

have fun


If anything doesn't work or you have a request for an app please leave a comment.  The next pack will be a tools pack which is more of business type tools.
